headline.main: NEWS OF THE REBELLION.; ITEMS FROM WASHINGTON

docs.lead_paragraph: Special dispatchees to the Philadelphia papers, dated Washington, Jan. 18, furnish these items:

docs.snippet: JOHN TYLER, of Virginia, the only Ex-President resident in the seceded States, is dead. There are yet some gentlemen living who have sat in the presidential Chair VAN BUREN and FILLMORE in New-York, PIERCE in New-Hampshire, and BUCHANAN in...
docs.abstract: Died in Virginia, aged 71, on January 17; biographical sketch; Tyler, John; ex-Pres. of US
docs.lead_paragraph: JOHN TYLER, of Virginia, the only Ex-President resident in the seceded States, is dead. There are yet some gentlemen living who have sat in the presidential Chair VAN BUREN and FILLMORE in New-York, PIERCE in New-Hampshire, and BUCHANAN in Pennsylvania all in the loyal States. The events of Mr. TYLER'S career, though familiar to almost everybody, may, now that he has passed forever off the stage, be briefly recapitulated.
